rooms.description: An inviting entrance with a reception area, incorporating Chettinad architectural details such as carved stone pillars and traditional motifs.

A landscaped courtyard featuring local flora, water features for positive energy flow per Vastu guidelines, and ample natural light. The courtyard serves as a communal space connecting different parts of the home.
The master bedroom includes an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. Traditional Chettinad elements like wood carvings and terracotta tiles are integrated in the decor.
A spacious guest room with traditional Indian design aesthetics, suitable for occasional visitors.
Modern kitchen designed with local materials and ergonomic layout, featuring a central island that doubles as a prep area and social space.
A large living room offering comfortable seating arrangements, traditional decor elements, and integrated media storage for the home theater system.
Dedicated home office space with ample natural light, designed to minimize distractions while adhering to local building norms and incorporating Chettinad-style accents.

openings.description: Large entrance door with traditional detailing, leading directly into the central courtyard for energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Separate access points to different sections of the apartment for functional segmentation and ease of movement.
Open windows and French doors that allow natural light and ventilation into adjoining rooms, enhancing comfort and air quality.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom suitable for family members or a study space, incorporating traditional design elements.
A dedicated home theater with acoustic treatment and seating arrangements designed to provide an immersive entertainment experience, integrating Chettinad style decor for harmony.

openings.description: Split-level staircase connecting ground and first floors with ample railings and natural stone accents for safety and aesthetics.
Balconies offering views of the courtyard, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles by enhancing positive energy flow.
